subtitleNullable: Optical Character Recognition Dataset containing Various Fonts and Style
descriptionNullable:
### Context

 I decided to create this dataset in order to train my own character recognition system


### Content

This dataset contains 2 folders  
1. data ( new version with greater pixels intensity)

2. data2(older version)



### Inspiration

if you have tried MNIST hand-written dataset and couldn't get your objective done give it a try to this dataset
